title: Falling Hard
description: She knows it won't last...  Nicholas Cevasco is unlike anyone Daria Kramer has ever dated. But they aren't really even dating – a fast fling is all they have time for. He's heading to Japan to play pro rugby, and she's graduating in three weeks with plans of her own.  That doesn't mean they can't have fun…as long as they don't fall hard.  This title was previously published as The Harder We Fall.  This is a Standalone Romance with No Cliffhanger.
author: Mina V. Esguerra
